plantuml: Create UML Graphs using PlantUML Syntax

Source: R/plantuml-package.R
plantuml-package.Rd

Create UML graphs using the PlantUML language. These are either shown in a graphics device or saved as a file.

See also

Useful links:

  • https://github.com/rkrug/plantuml

  • Report bugs at https://github.com/rkrug/plantuml/issues

Author

Maintainer: Rainer M. Krug Rainer@krugs.de (ORCID)
